messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Re: Rude parenting/Dog Chatter and beer
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 17/05/2003 19:58:25 Pacific Daylight Time, ... Well that sounds like fun, tho you are too far away. My condolences on owning the beagle
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 17/05/2003 19:58:25 Pacific Daylight Time,
kbcdlovejo@... writes:


> I have one English beagle and one German shepherd dog. A refrigerator full
> of beer and wine (well, two wine bottles fewer since supper). I'm a happy
> camper! <g>
>
>


Well that sounds like fun, tho you are too far away. My condolences on owning
the beagle<G> The GSD sounds ok, that is what we have. I wonder how we can
fit the 2 schipperke in to the party, being from neither england or germany.A
case of wine in the basement and some beer. Not bad for people who almost
never drink!
Nancy, who still needs to get out more in BC


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
